divs: sighting detailsit was a rainy day with clouds in the sky. i came from outside and when gazed outside my 8th floor apartment's window i noticed a small black object( disc shaped) going from south to north direction. it was some unusual object and not the usual flight\balloon. i tried to capture the video using my phone but in the moment of hurry and excitement, it was not possible and in the attached file one can see a glimpse of the object at 19 to 21 second.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Aalborg
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: a disc shaped object noticed in the cloudy sky.
